name: typescriptlearning
description: - You must install typescript in your PC (Refer to any youtube video) - Make a `index.ts` file , this is basically your typescript file - Run the command `tsc --init`, it will make a `tsconfig.json` file     - Inside the `tsconfig.json` file you can make changes but let it be - `tsc` is a compiler to convert typescript into javascript  - When we run command `tsc` it converts all of `.ts` files to `.js` files
